taskDescription: A custom bike factory has a backlog of 23 orders for bikes.  It can manufacture and ship 5 bikes a day.  Assuming no new orders arrive, construct a model showing how the backlog changes daily.  The backlog must not become negative; that would not make sense.
Hint:  In order to prevent the backlog from becoming negative, use the function min(â€¦).

givenModelNodes.name: Backlog
givenModelNodes.description: The number of orders waiting to be fulfilled

givenModelNodes.name: Max bikes shipped
givenModelNodes.description: Maximum number of bikes that can be shipped in one day
